author: Michael Ellison
title: Coronavirus closed colleges and sent students home. Some have nowhere to go.
description: The line between success and failure is razor thin for low-income student. Campuses that don't do more to help them now might find they can't ever return.
content: For low-income college students, a semesters expenses almost always come down to the wire. You add up all the bare necessities youll need to live on, ration income from work-study and part-time jobs, and hope that its enough to get you past finals. Then you s… [+6736 chars]
